properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

details.description: Gets or sets the details of the assessment.

scope.description: Gets or sets the scope of assessment.

settings.description: Gets or sets the settings for the assessment.

azureLocation.description: Azure Location or Azure region where to which the machines will be migrated.

billingSettings.description: Gets or sets the billing settings.

category.description: Gets or sets azure VM category.

currency.description: Currency in which prices should be reported.

environmentType.description: Gets or sets user configurable setting to display the environment type.

performanceData.description: Gets or sets the performance data.

savingsSettings.description: Gets or sets the savings settings.

scalingFactor.description:
Percentage of buffer that user wants on performance metrics when recommending
Azure sizes.

isolationRequired.description: Gets or sets the isolation required.

settings.description: Gets or sets the settings for the assessment.

billingSettings.description: Gets or sets the billing settings.

cpuHeadroom.description: Gets or sets the CPU headroom.

externalStorageTypes.description: List of AVS external storage types.

failuresToTolerateAndRaidLevelList.description: List of Failures to tolerate and RAID levels in a common property.

performanceData.description: Gets or sets the performance data.

savingsSettings.description: Gets or sets the savings settings.

scalingFactor.description:
Percentage of buffer that user wants on performance metrics when recommending
Azure sizes.

monitoringSettings.description: Gets the azure arc monitoring settings.

azureArcState.description: AzureArc state indicates whether to include azure arc related costs in on-premises or not.

laborCostPercentage.description: Gets Azure arc labour cost percentage.

performanceDataEndTime.description: Gets end time to use for performance.

performanceDataStartTime.description: Gets start time to use for performance.

perYearMigrationCompletionPercentage.description: Gets migration completion percentage per year.

savingsOption.description: Gets the business case savings option type.

licensingProgram.description: Gets or sets the licensing program.

subscriptionId.description: Gets or sets the subscription ID for licensing program selected.

lastHeartbeatUtc.description: Gets the collector last heartbeat time.

spnDetails.description: Gets or sets the SPN details.

objectId.description: Gets the object id of the AAD application.

tenantId.description: Gets the tenant id of the AAD application.

agentProperties.description: Gets or sets the collector agent properties.

targetAssessmentArmIds.description: ARM IDs of the target assessments.

numberOfPhysicalCoresPerLicense.description: Number of physical cores per licence.

azureDiskTypes.description: The disk type for the assessment.

azureHybridUseBenefit.description:
Gets or sets the user configurable setting to display the azure hybrid use
benefit.

azureLocation.description: Azure Location or Azure region where to which the machines will be migrated.

azurePricingTier.description: Gets or sets Azure Pricing Tier - Free, Basic, etc.

azureStorageRedundancy.description: Gets or sets the Azure Storage Redundancy. Example: Locally Redundant Storage.

azureVmFamilies.description: Gets or sets the Azure VM families.

azureVmSecurityOptions.description: Gets or sets the Azure VM security options.

billingSettings.description: Gets or sets the billing settings.

currency.description: Currency in which prices should be reported.

environmentType.description: Gets or sets user configurable setting to display the environment type.

linuxAzureHybridUseBenefit.description:
Gets or sets the user configurable setting to display the linux azure hybrid use
benefit.

savingsSettings.description: Gets or sets the savings settings.

scalingFactor.description:
Percentage of buffer that user wants on performance metrics when recommending
Azure sizes.

Gets or sets the duration for which the VMs are up in the on-premises
environment.

details.description: Gets or sets the details of the assessment.

scope.description: Gets or sets the scope of assessment.

settings.description: Gets or sets the settings for the assessment.

physicalServersPerCabinet.description: Number of physical servers per cabinet

dataProtectionCostPerServerPerYear.description: Data Protection Cost Per Server Per Year.

monitoringCostPerServerPerYear.description: Monitoring Cost Per Server Per Year.

patchingCostPerServerPerYear.description: Patching Cost Per Server Per Year.

percentile.description:
Percentile of the utilization data values to be considered while assessing
machines.

perfDataEndTime.description: Gets or sets the end time to consider performance data for assessment.

perfDataStartTime.description: Gets or sets the start time to consider performance data for assessment.

timeRange.description:
Time Range for which the historic utilization data should be considered for
assessment.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

assessmentSolutionId.description: Assessment solution ARM id tracked by Microsoft.Migrate/migrateProjects.

customerStorageAccountArmId.description:
The ARM id of the storage account used for interactions when public access is
disabled.

customerWorkspaceId.description: The ARM id of service map workspace created by customer.

customerWorkspaceLocation.description: Location of service map workspace created by customer.

publicNetworkAccess.description:
This value can be set to 'enabled' to avoid breaking changes on existing
customer resources and templates. If set to 'disabled', traffic over public
interface is not allowed, and private endpoint connections would be the
exclusive access method.

azureOfferCode.description: Gets or sets the Azure offer code.

savingsOptions.description: Gets or sets the savings options.

azureSettings.description: Azure settings for a business case.

asyncCommitModeIntent.description: Gets or sets user preference indicating intent of async commit mode.

azureLocation.description: Azure Location or Azure region where to which the machines will be migrated.

azureSecurityOfferingType.description: Gets or sets a value indicating azure security offering type.

enableHadrAssessment.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether HADR assessments needs to be created.

entityUptime.description:
Gets or sets the duration for which the entity (SQL, VMs) are up in the
on-premises environment.

environmentType.description: Gets or sets user configurable setting to display the environment type.

isInternetAccessAvailable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether internet access is available.

multiSubnetIntent.description: Gets or sets user preference indicating intent of multi-subnet configuration.

osLicense.description: Gets or sets user configurable setting to display the azure hybrid use benefit.

preferredTargets.description: Gets or sets SQL the preferred azure targets.
